entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
